meanings.definition: To concentrate on and become an expert in a particular subject or skill.
meanings.sent1: She is specializing in math, which means she is becoming really good at it.
meanings.sent2: The company is specializing in web design to offer top-notch services.
meanings.sent3: By specializing in baking, she can make the most delicious cakes in town.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to specializing in painting turned him into a true artist.
meanings.sent5: Specializing in a craft is like diving deep into a sea of knowledge.

meanings.definition: To focus on a specific area or type of work.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant is specializing in Italian cuisine to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: She is specializing in marketing, which means she knows a lot about promoting products.
meanings.sent3: By specializing in gardening, he can grow the most beautiful flowers in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to specialize in photography made her stand out among other artists.
meanings.sent5: Specializing in a field is like planting roots in fertile soil.
